message: Let's split the money 70/30. This offer benefits us both, but I need a little more to account for the faster inflation rate I'm experiencing.
I'm happy to offer you 40 dollars, as that gives us both a fair split. I'm willing to take a smaller portion now because I believe it will give us both more money in the long run.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but your offer doesn't account for the faster rate of inflation I'm facing.  I'm proposing a 65/35 split this time. Let's be reasonable and get this done!
